Package civitas.celestis.geometry

Class Geometry

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.geometry.Geometry
public final class Geometry extends Object
Contains geometric utilities.

    Given a tetrahedron in the form of its four corners, this returns the signed volume of the tetrahedron.

  • Method Details

    • signedVolume

      public static double signedVolume(@Nonnull Vector3 a, @Nonnull Vector3 b, @Nonnull Vector3 c, @Nonnull Vector3 d)
      Given a tetrahedron in the form of its four corners, this returns the signed volume of the tetrahedron.
      Parameters:
      a - The first corner of the tetrahedron
      b - The second corner of the tetrahedron
      c - The third corner of the tetrahedron
      d - The fourth corner of the tetrahedron
      Returns:
      The singed volume of the tetrahedron

    • intersects

      public static boolean intersects(@Nonnull Face face, @Nonnull Ray ray)
      Checks if the face and ray have an intersection.
      Parameters:
      face - The face to check
      ray - The ray to check
      Returns:
      true if the face and ray have an intersection

    • intersection

      @Nullable public static Vector3 intersection(@Nonnull Face face, @Nonnull Ray ray)
      Calculates the point of intersection between a face and ray.
      Parameters:
      face - The face
      ray - The ray
      Returns:
      The intersection if found, null if not

    • reflect

      @Nonnull public static Vector3 reflect(@Nonnull Vector3 i, @Nonnull Vector3 n)
      Given an incident vector and the surface normal, this calculates the reflection vector if the incident vector were to collide with the surface. The surface normal is assumed to be normalized.
      Parameters:
      i - The incident vector
      n - The surface normal
      Returns:
      The reflection vector
